page.title: 10Games Children Play
page.content: The children of Cwmdare School play a variety of games in the school yard such as "Touch","Fireball","Traffic Lights","May I","Killer","Polo"and "Corners."The most popular games are "Under The Apple Tree","Link Touch"and "King."Some children have invented games such as "Heinz Invaders." To play "Heinz Invaders" one child goes "on it" and has to catch the other children.The child on it counts to 10 and shouts "Heinz Invaders!"The other children have to run.When the child on it catches another child both of them go on it.When everyone gets caught the first person who got caught goes on it. These games are played by children from the "Infant"and "Junior" department.They are also played at home or in the street as well as in the school playground.
